title: Ticket #1961: "Node not found" message should know about retries
description: I have a fix ready for #1957, which will result in a "node not found" message in the series of events that produce the problem. Pete and I talked about this, and we want to have a different message when a Condor ID belongs to a previous submission of a given node, versus belonging to a job that is not a node job of the current DAG at all. Our current idea is to either have a stack of CondorIDs in the Job object, or else a sort of "dummy" job object that holds IDs of previous submissions of a node. I'm just going to do the simple fix for 7.6.0, and we'll aim to get the more comprehensive fix into 7.7.0.
